channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Mystic (Neutral)
channel.description:
Day Ability 1: TODO
Day Ability 2 (Optional): TODO
Night Ability 1: Dark Ritual (1 night cooldown, infinite use) The dark ritual does nothing, however, if you are killed whilst performing the ritual, you will be angered and exact your revenge from beyond the grave
Night Ability 2: Haunt [Only usable if you have died while performing a dark ritual] You will haunt a player, killing them(their role will be hidden), you shall then use their corpse to resurrect yourself, however, you will realise what you have done and feel stricken with guilt, and decide to finish what they started(you become their role) Note: All neutrals and the Cult Leader are immune to haunting
Lore: Something about worshiping a demon IDK
Notes: Immune to conversion
Comments: IDK it's probably bad
